擬.definition: to plan to; to draft (a plan); to imitate; to assess; to compare; pseudo-

擬作.definition: to write in the style of some author; to write as if from the mouth of sb; a pastiche

擬具.definition: to draft; to devise; to compose

擬古.definition: to emulate a classic; to work in the style of a classic (author)

擬古之作.definition: a work in a classic style; a pastiche

擬合.definition: to fit (data to a model); a (close) fit

擬大朱雀.definition: (bird species of China) streaked rosefinch (Carpodacus rubicilloides)

擬定.definition: to draw up; to draft; to formulate

擬游隼.definition: (bird species of China) Barbary falcon (Falco pelegrinoides)

擬球.definition: (math.) pseudosphere, a surface in ordinary space of constant negative curvature

擬音.definition: to make a sound effect; sound effect; (historical linguistics) to reconstruct the sound system of an archaic language
